column5: Brian and Terry: it was nice to meet the both of you.  I thought we were going to eventually see each other downstream, but I guess we will share a drift next time
Yes, definitely can appreciate some nice tail!
Yes,it was nice as well.Water was slow,so made the move down river.  Let me know when your up this way again. Still lots of time to fish.  Nice pic.
Thought this was about something else...  Carry on!  Nice tail btw.
Always great to meet other OFCs.....
You all need to get out more.
you can never really appreciate a fine piece of tail unless you examine it thoroughly....437 spots on that one
I counted 183 on the bottom half but then again my Pc isnt the best.  183 x 2= 366  Just baord thats all..
Yes but can you see the dark blue one?  Art
